name: Coloring Animal Zoo Touch To Color Activity Coloring Book For Kids and Family Preschool Ultimate Edition
summary:
Top kids and family app on iTunes in 148 countries!
Welcome to the Coloring Animal Zoo, where interacting with every page is easier than ever; simply touch to color! But that’s just the beginning!
Complete fun tasks like popping bubbles in the aquarium, chasing the parrot in the aviary and helping cute little birds clean the hippo’s teeth!
As you complete each page new things appear to color! Touch the barrel and monkeys pop out, Touch each monkey to put silly hats on their heads!
